headline: A Look At L3Harris Technologies (LHX) Valuation After Strong Q4 Earnings And New U.S. Navy Contract
summary: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) has drawn fresh attention after strong fourth quarter earnings, updated 2026 guidance, and a new U.S. Navy contract for its Red Wolf long range precision weapon system. See our latest analysis for L3Harris Technologies. At a share price of US$350.60, L3Harris has logged a 16.22% 90 day share price return and a 71.43% 1 year total shareholder return, suggesting momentum has been building around recent earnings and defense contract announcements. If this defense news...
